name: D/D Ghost
effectText: If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 "D/D" monster or "Dark Contract" card in your GY, except "D/D Ghost"; send 1 card from your Deck to the GY with that name. If this card is banished: You can target 1 of your banished "D/D" monsters or "Dark Contract" cards, except "D/D Ghost"; return it to the GY.
